name: Circa
headline: Event marketing CRM
description: Circa is the event marketing platform built for demand gen and field marketing teams. We help sales and marketing teams work on events, everywhere and every way their customers gather.

founders.name: Alex Patriquin, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Founder & CEO of Circa YC S16

generated_description:
Circa is an event marketing CRM designed specifically for demand generation and field marketing teams. Founded in 2016 as part of Y Combinator’s S16 batch, Circa operates out of Santa Fe, NM, with a compact team of 21 employees. Their mission? To simplify event planning and execution so that sales and marketing teams can effectively engage their customers at any gathering point.

At its core, Circa is all about making the complex process of event management straightforward. It provides a suite of features that enhance collaboration among stakeholders, optimize budgeting, and streamline task planning. For example, their platform offers customizable event calendars, checklists, templates, and budgeting tools—everything you need to turn a brainstorming session into a successful event.

The company is solidly positioned within the sales enablement landscape, making it easier for marketers to tap into ideas from their sales teams and manage the logistics of multiple events simultaneously. Circa’s tools empower users to create structured processes, which reduce the time and stress typically associated with event planning.

Now, with Circa, planning an event isn't just about logistics; it's about measurable success. Whether you’re coordinating a conference sponsorship, preparing for a trade show, or organizing a hosted conference, Circa provides templates that help streamline the entire process. They even offer a free trial for new users—no credit card required—so you can experience firsthand how they lighten your workload.

If you're interested in discovering more, head over to their website at [circa.co](http://www.circa.co). There, you can check out their offerings, get started with event management templates, and see how Circa can help redefine your event marketing approach.
